messages.title: The choice at the General Election
messages.content: Competent leadership or Coalition of chaos. The deficit down, Income tax cut, More jobs, New businesses, Higher wages versus Labour is plotting Scottish alliance, Miliband will bankrupt Britain, Spending more, More debt, Less tech Jobs, Higher taxes

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Attract more people to the town by using my business experience and publicise Wrexham; Full EU Referendum; Local economy made possible by improved infrastructure and better mobile signals, broadband and 4G.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour plan to borrow risks £170bn extra debt. Salmond, Miliband

issues.economy: More jobs and Higher wages versus More debt and Higher taxes.
issues.governance: Competent leadership versus Coalition of chaos.

leaflet.personalStatement: Born in Wrexham, I live here with my wife and our two kids. I'm passionate about where we live and want the best for our community.

politicalExperience.role: Trustee of a children's charity and as a Non-Executive Director of a Leisure Trust
politicalExperience.achievements: Experience as trustee of a children's charity and as a Non-Executive Director of a Leisure Trust working with children and young people.

politicalExperience.role: Founder of a non-profit business networking and support group
politicalExperience.achievements: Founder of a not-for-profit business networking and support group to work on...
Includes chair of committees, Deputy Leader of electoral group, researcher for an MP, Community Activist, Chairman of team for economic development.

images.caption: Andrew Atkinson and his family near the river in Wrexham.
Andrew out and about in the town (talking to constituents).
Andrew Atkinson at Alyn Waters Country Park.
